title: Ukraine Live Updates: U.S. Prepares Response as Putin Orders Forces to Separatist Enclaves
content:
1. Ukraine Live Updates: U.S. Prepares Response as Putin Orders Forces to Separatist Enclaves  The New York Times
  2. Putin signs decrees recognizing areas of Ukraine as independent  CNN
  3. Global leaders condemn Putin moves -- China urges 'restraint'  New York Post
  4. Putin recognises Ukraine breakaway regions as independent, sparking Russian invasion fear - BBC News  BBC News
  5. Putin moves troops, Biden levies sanctions and Europe prepares for war  Yahoo News
